title: PT1 Differentiator Function Block
description: This function block implements a PT1 filter and a differentiator. The block takes an input value and processes it using a differentiator followed by a PT1 filter. The final output is a combination of the filtered value and scaled input.
name: FT_PDT1

input.name: IN
input.description: The input signal to be processed.

input.name: KP
input.description: The proportional gain factor, default value is 1.0.

input.name: TV
input.description: The time constant for the differentiator, default value is 1.0.

input.name: T1
input.description: The time constant for the PT1 filter, default value is 1.0.

output.name: Y
output.description: The output of the function block, which is the combined result of the processed input.
